## hpr1765 :: 53 - LibreOffice Impress - Outlining and Blank Presentations

 
Having looked at the screen layout, now we can look at how to build a presentation by focusing on the content first, and not the eye candy. This can be done by creating an outline, or by beginning with a blank presentation. We discuss both and give some ideas on which to use in each situation.
For more go to https://www.ahuka.com/?page_id=1100

Links

https://www.ahuka.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Sample-Outline-for-Impress.odt

https://www.ahuka.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Sample-Presentation-from-Outline.odp

https://www.ahuka.com/?page_id=1100
